From Brutally Trolling Her To Now Demanding Her Presence, Virat Kohli Fans Don’t Hate Anushka Sharma Anymore
From Brutally Trolling Her To Now Demanding Her Presence, Virat Kohli Fans Don’t Hate Anushka Sharma Anymore
More girls swoon over Virat Kohli than the number of boys that drool over Anushka Sharma, but together they make a power couple that gives relationship goals to many people.
Fondly called Virushka, when Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma had tied the knot, a lot of hearts were broken, but at the same time, all of us were ecstatic to see them head over heels in love with each other.
Instagram
But do you remember the time when Virat Kohli couldn’t perform well on the cricket field and haters put the blame on Anushka Sharma for just being present on the field? We all play the blame game and point fingers at others when things go wrong, and so did the social media trolls at one point of time.

But seemingly, things are changing and how! Now, people just cannot get enough of the lovely couple that Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli make. So much so, that they want to see them together more often.
Also Read: Virat Kohli & Anushka Sharma Show They Are BFFs Before Lovers & People Can't Stop Swooning Over The Couple!
Twitter
So, recently when Virat Kohli was batting at the Brabourne stadium, fans were craving for the presence of the power couple. They chanted Anushka’s name when Virat was playing on the field. Virat Kohli approved of the gesture and gave a thumbs up!
So, when Anushka makes a public appearance, fans often chant Virat Kohli’s name. Don’t believe us? The video below is a proof!
“Jee haan haan.. Sabko unse (@imVkohli) prem hai, Mujhe bhi hai... Sabko unki yaad aa rahi hai, mujhe bhi aa rahi hai...” @AnushkaSharma 💖 #Virushka pic.twitter.com/9RQnOgzarn — 🌚 (@jugheadjasoos) September 2, 2018
May the love of fans for Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma keep growing, and may they stay happy together forever!
